data.text: @RSmithInc @TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews what we do know is that we know nothing...but the omicrom variant is not over

@georgedemirakos @TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews Hope you don’t either.
We don’t know if there are long term effects from the vax either…
@RSmithInc @TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews I did not get it and from what I am reading about long term heart and brain issues, I will hopefully never get it.

@georgedemirakos @TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews I did get it.
3 days of the flu.
I’m fine.
I hope no one gets it but it one exercises and is realistically heathy it’s not a big issue.
If over 75 and overweight it’s a problem.
We easily can handle that.
@TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews Awesome behind the scenes pic Dom.🔥🔥🔥🔫
@TheDomino @CNBC Enjoy - Los Angeles County (mostly) removed indoor mask rule this past weekend. Hopefully in a few months we'll feel normal too. #Covid
@RSmithInc @TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews I live in Canada..hope you do not get Covid..

@georgedemirakos @TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews You mean like the flu?
Was it an issue? Yes.
Did people die? Yes.
Is it time to move on? Yes.
You have seen the numbers…
Florida vs NY….
Don’t fall for political BS…

@RSmithInc @TheDomino @CNBC @Lebeaucarnews To push away the fact that healthy people have died and are still dying from Covid and you compare it to obese people is amusing and ill-advised. I am sure you know people who have gotten it and are not obese.
